column1: '''''The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition''''' is a special edition album comprising of the soundtrack from ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'', by [[Howard Shore]]. It was released digitally and on CD on [[11 December]] [[2012]].<ref>{{webcite
